Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE FUNCTION IsClassesHasProperty ( @propdef_id CHAR(32), @item_classes VARCHAR(MAX) ) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN ( SELECT TOP 1 9 as p from [innovator].[XCLASS_XPROPERTY_FLATTEN] xclass_xproperty_flatten WHERE xclass_xproperty_flatten.RELATED_ID = @propdef_id AND (CHARINDEX(xclass_xproperty_flatten.SOURCE_ID COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2, @item_classes) > 0) )
Item.name: IsClassesHasProperty
